message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. For this exceptional item, I propose an introductory price of $150. I believe it's a fair offer considering its quality and value. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product. Would you consider selling it for $120? I believe this price reflects the value I am seeking.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to pay the full value of the product. Considering the high quality and unique features of our item, I would like to offer you a special deal at $140. This is a reasonable compromise, aiming to satisfy both parties involved.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've considered your proposal and am willing to negotiate further. Could you please consider selling the product for $135? This would allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I would like to suggest a price of $138 for our product. This offers a slight increase from my previous proposal while still being a fair reflection of the product's value. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've reviewed it carefully and would like to propose a price of $137 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of your product while also meeting my budget constraints.

Thank you for your thoughtful response, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $136 for the product. This represents a slight adjustment towards your proposed price while still ensuring a fair valuation of our product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
